L2-Scripts.com -> Info



Special commands:
.menu - personal settings .myinfo - additional information about your char .rcm - call clan members to clan leader .offline - allows to exit, leaving a char to trade .lock - security system .reloc - if your char can not enter a game (takes off with a critical error, or embarks only to illumination), use this command other char from the same account. It will send your char in Cedric's Training Hall
I want to participate in event TvT
I want to participate in event CtF
